name: Vesania
description:
This is a concept of a game that a group of us have produced at college for a WEXP lesson. The people involved in making this are:

George Chandler, Callum Carthy, Rosie Carter, Dylan Benney, Owen Jones, Toby-Yarnley-Cave and Zachary Ashenford. 

The game was supposed to be surrounded around the concept of A.I. going wrong and the idea of 'perfection'. A little bit of what I planned the story to be is in the showroom but it really doesn't reflect the full product. 

The demo shows Toby's coding within Callum and Zach's level.
